text: The Metropolitan Police Department shall make a report of each complaint of identity theft and provide the complainant with a copy of the report.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(c) of Identity Thief Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-388, March 18, 2004, 51 DCR 3382).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-106, see notes following § 22-3227.01.

DC CODE § 22-3227.08

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Theft; Fraud; Stolen Property; Forgery; and Extortion.
